title: Greg Dulli and the Afghan Whigs Are Back (Ep. 147)
description:
The Ringer’s Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald sit down with Afghan Whigs frontman Greg Dulli to discuss his band's new album, ‘In Spades,’ and the story of how he first met Chris and Andy more than 15 years ago.
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
